Package net.objectzoo.ebc.impl

Class StartAndSignalBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.objectzoo.ebc.impl.StartBoard
      • net.objectzoo.ebc.impl.StartAndSignalBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CanStart, SendsSignal, StartAndSignalFlow
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StartAndSignalBase
    public abstract class StartAndSignalBoard
extends StartBoard
implements StartAndSignalFlow
    A base class for a board that CanStart and SendsSignal. The implementation contains the boilerplate code required to implement the interfaces and provides Event0Delegates for action and event invocations.
    Author:
    tilmann

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected net.objectzoo.events.impl.Event0Delegate signalEvent
      This Event0Delegate can be used by subclasses to send the signal event
